entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,12,1,1}{F813,0,192005}The layer of bedrock that covered{F801}Tokyo is gone...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,192006}Our homeland... What has become of{F801}the Eastern Kingdom of Mikado?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}]We are met with one wave of madness{F801}after another.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,10,1,1}{F813,0,192007}We're in Tokyo, yes? Is this place{F801}truly Tokyo...?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,10,1,1}{F813,0,192007}We're in Tokyo, yes? Is this place{F801}truly Tokyo...?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F813,0,192008}Would you please refrain from asking{F801}me that?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F813,0,192008}Would you please refrain from asking{F801}me that?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,6,1,1}{F813,0,192009}I should like to find someone who{F801}does know what the truth of this.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,192010}Assuming anyone does, that is...{F801}
